name: Sk8 on Fire
description:
Hipercasual Game made for TRIJAM #168, I can't do all the things I would like to do within this time but I did my best, I hope you have fun! It was supposed to be done in 3 hours, but I got carried away with the graphics and over 8 hours of development.

You're a skateboarder on fire, taking a spin around town. Collect as many stars as you can on the street without hitting cars and people.

You can play mobile with the screen buttons or on the computer, moving up and down with the arrow keys.

Game by Róger Goulart (Instagram: @roger_goulart)
